short_description: Estimate the predict values based on given ARIMA model.
long_description: Estimate the predict values based on parameters of ARIMA model original sereis and the residuals of original series.

argument_clauses.name: Domain
argument_clauses.description: The address of the Queen. The host parameter is the Aster Database Queenâ€™s IP saddress or hostname.

argument_clauses.name: Database
argument_clauses.description: The name of the database where the input table is located.

argument_clauses.name: UserId
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database user name of the user running this function.

argument_clauses.name: Password
argument_clauses.description: The Aster Database password of the user.

argument_clauses.name: SSLSettings
argument_clauses.description: A string that includes all the SSL settings, except the password for the truststore.

argument_clauses.name: SSLTrustStorePassword
argument_clauses.description: The password for the SSL truststore.

argument_clauses.name: ModelTable
argument_clauses.description: The input table for arima model parameters.

argument_clauses.name: ResidualTable
argument_clauses.description: The input table that contains the original series and corresponding residuals.

argument_clauses.name: TimestampColumns
argument_clauses.description: A list of columns specify the sequence of the series in residuals table. The sequence should have uniform intervals.

argument_clauses.name: ValueColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column containing the time series data in residuals table. The default name is value. Input columns must contain numeric SQL types.

argument_clauses.name: ResidualColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specify the name of the column containing the residual from  residuals table. The default name is residual. Input columns must contain numeric SQL types.

argument_clauses.name: StepAhead
argument_clauses.description: The number of steps to forecast after the end of the time series. The input value must be greater than 0.
